comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.gentside.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.gentside.com/news/insolite/etes-vous-timide-ou-confiant-cette-illusion-doptique-permettrait-de-vous-percer-a-jour_art103379.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gentside.com%2Fnews%2Finsolite%2Fetes-vous-timide-ou-confiant-cette-illusion-doptique-permettrait-de-vous-percer-a-jour_art103379.html) ### Comment > Hello! I use the Allow nonintrusive advertising filter ( https://easylist-downloads.adblockplus.org/exceptionrules.txt ) and would like to unblock the podcasts on the website. However, it looks like the French filter blocks them. Could you please unblock the podcasts? ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/csxsq9zyxqg44gssggog4oc40kgk48kathkf8s3d28.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/mcrtt5bl5z4044o0ksowssww84ck4g0c6s04d6kcwo.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.3 System version: | Android 13 Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `AdGuard`, `DNS`, `doh`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard French Userscripts: | AdGuard Extra

comment.body:
Hi,

Just one question about Start app, i just checked connection to https website and found that Start is using Adguard certificate correctly.

Please find below screenshot of Start app showing connection details :

[Image]

So i think https filtering is working and i can see also in Adguard logs that ads are blocked only when https filtering is enabled.

So can i can use Start for browsing with Adguard ?

Thanks,
Franois-Rgis

Envoy  partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
From: Franois-Rgis BONA ***@***.***>
Sent: Tuesday, January 23, 2024 9:49:13 AM
To: AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>; AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>
Cc: Comment ***@***.***>
Subject: Re: [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters] www.gentside.com (Issue #170996)

Perfect ! Just found my new browser...

Thanks again for your help 


Envoy  partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
From: Adam ***@***.***>
Sent: Tuesday, January 23, 2024 9:40:02 AM
To: AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>
Cc: frbona ***@***.***>; Comment ***@***.***>
Subject: Re: [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters] www.gentside.com (Issue #170996)


Yes, after manually enabling HTTPS filtering for this browser in AdGuard's settings, it's working correctly.


Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/170996#issuecomment-1905562806>, or unsubscribe<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ASD3T5YFYV7TA4IRCTJMQD3YP5ZOFAVCNFSM6AAAAABCAHOCBCVHI2DSMVQWIX3LMV43OSLTON2WKQ3PNVWWK3TUHMYTSMBVGU3DEOBQGY>.
You are receiving this because you commented.Message ID: ***@***.***>
